It will take few minutes for download to complete. Thanks for your patience !!! block level data loaded successfully --Select Block-- district: blocks and clusters downloaded All the surveys submitted will be available for report generation after 24 hours of syncing Select grade Add your comment FAQ Please login and continue Required comment Please select grade Report not available for this survey Can I monitor more than 1 classroom during my visit? If yes, how do I record that? Yes You can select more than one class during your visit. But you have to submit a single survey for each class you visit What if there is a multi-grade class in session? You can select \'multi-grade\' option in the classroom field What happens if the math teacher is not conducting the math class during my visit, but he/she uses the math kit as part of the classroom activity Please record the kit usage only if the teacher is found using the math kit during your school visit. Otherwise you can mention the fact that teacher uses the math kit in the comments section. The math teacher was a guest teacher and was not part of the GKA teacher\'s training. How do we train them? You can demo the kit to the guest teacher and spend an hour explaining the various usage of the kit. Demo it to the teacher with the students as well GKA kit is kept in a cupboard and was not in use. How do we report this? Answer NO to all the question regarding kit usage. Write a comment stating the state of the kit and upload a picture There is no square ruled books in the school to practice the representational method of CRA. What can be done? Use the black board that is painted for the kids on the side walls and paint it with square ruled boxes (two 9 boxes one below the other) Teacher has prepared a few TLMs him/herself. Can that be used to teach kids in the classroom? Yes. It is allowed for teachers to use her/his own TLMs There are more than 40 students in the classroom and teacher feels one kit is not sufficient to teach kids mathematics. Encourage teachers to develop kits similar to provided as part of GKA. Teachers can replicate the math kit contents. Teachers asked me a question on the math concepts and usage of the math kit TLMs. I did not have any answer what to do? If you do not know the answers, please direct the question to CRPs/Akshara staff or HMs Unable to type comments in Kannada. Use the keyboard that allows kannada letters to be typed. What is the limit on words/letters for the comments field? Not more than 500 words Can I upload videos instead of photos? We currently do not have this facility. We will introduce it next academic year. Do I have to sync the school visit survey everyday? What is the frequency of syncing survey? There is no need to sync survey if you are online. Syncing will happen automatically How do I know about the monitoring surveys I have done so far? You can generate the report using the ILP Konnect Who can use ILP Konnect app for GKA school visit? NGO Staff (Akshara or any other), Volunteers, Education officers (CRP, BRP, DIET, BEO etc), HMs Can Teachers use this app? Not for GKA school visit monitoring. Select option Surveys not available
